{"step_by_step_thinking": "Histiocytosis is a rare disease that involves an over-production of white blood cells known as histiocytes. Cladribine is a purine analog used in the treatment of several types of hematological malignancies, including refractory histiocytosis. High dose methotrexate and high dose cytarabine are used in the treatment of different types of cancers, but not specifically for refractory histiocytosis.
